projects.name: Project Express API
projects.title: Project Express API
projects.body: This project entails creating a backend API using Express, adhering to RESTful principles. The API features multiple endpoints to retrieve either a collection of data or a single item.

projects.name: To-do App
projects.title: To-do App
projects.body: In this project, we built a todo application using React and the Context API, focusing on state management and component composition.

projects.name: Design Handoff Project
projects.title: Design Handoff Project
projects.body: Collaborate to transform a UX design student's mobile wireframe into a functional React application. Our focus will be on creating a responsive, mobile-first design that adheres closely to the provided specifications.

projects.name: Happy Thoughts API
projects.title: Happy Thoughts
projects.body: Happy Thoughts App: A React project focused on state management, API interactions for fetching and posting data. Features include a design-aligned UI, sorted thought display by recency, like count for each thought, a form for new thoughts, and a like functionality.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.title: Music Releases
projects.body: A React app to display albums. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity, hover effects, and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. Components provided; focus on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Popular Movies
projects.title: Popular Movies
projects.body: Project utilizing themoviedb.org's API to showcase movies and their details. Features fetching popular movies, rendering movie specifics, and managing image URLs. Designed with a focus on responsiveness and accessibility. Enhancements include error handling, loading states, and dynamic movie lists.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.title: Weather app
projects.body: Weather Web App - a simple app fetching weather forecast via an API. Changes theme depending on the weather.

projects.name: Chatbot Pizzeria
projects.title: Chatbot Pizzeria
projects.body: JavaScript Pizzeria is the first project of the coding bootcamp at Technigo. This project focuses on the use and understanding of data types, variables, and conditionals.
